question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:
•	explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months
•	say how your work could be done while you are away
•	ask for his/her help in arranging it,
You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter in order to inform you that I would like to work in our company’s head office in Hong Kong and I have requested our general manager for the same. I am hopeful, it will be approved very soon, I have heard a lot about their supply chain management department, I would like to gain some trade-in experience, that will be helpful in my career growth.

However, my job is related to computer and data transferring meanwhile, that I will be doing from Hong Kong along with the regular work there, but some of the important and urgent tasks have to be done by you.
As you know, we are in this company since last 6 years and I have helped you out on several occasions. Now, I need your help and I humbly request you to manage some of my work along with yours.
